references: Related: Res 14146, Ord 74573, Ord 74485. Repealing: Ord 72667
summary: An ordinance relating to an increase of $30.00 per month in the salary scale (base pay) of city employees, in lieu of war bonus, as contemplated by Resolution No. 14146, and a proportionate increase to per diem employees; providing for the payment of such increase; conditionally repealing Ordinance No. 72667, and making certain 1946 Budget item transfers.
